title: The sorcerer's lullaby
description: Luka Strykyrius knows what was, what is, and what will be. He can make mops dance, knives twirl, flowers bloom, and give people immortality. Of course, everything he does comes with a price and it seems the Fates are charging him interest. With life nothing, but a chore, Luka finds himself being chased by more than just the Fates. His past comes to haunt him in a new way that'll have him wishing he was dead-- or maybe wishing for something more...
author: rotxinxpieces
